## IBlockService interface

The interface to a js-ipfs block-service. See: [https://ipfs.github.io/js-ipfs-block-service](https://ipfs.github.io/js-ipfs-block-service)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IBlockService 
```
